author: olegk
msg: Always use CharArrayBuffer when reading from / writing to session input / output buffers

author: olegk
msg: TokenParser to use CharSequence instead of CharArrayBuffer

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-6046: add maxDeterminizedStates to determinize to prevent exhausting CPU/RAM when the automaton is too difficult to determinize

author: degenaro
msg: UIMA-4069 Redesign of JD toward the main goal of classpath separation for container (system) code.
Temporarily disable JUinit tests for ducc-container project.

author: breser
msg: FIx release packages to work with OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
* tools/dist/release.py: Bump libtool version to 2.4.3, versions prior to 2.4.3
treat OS X 10.10 as 10.1 which then causes the linker to be told to ignore
undefined symbols rather than resolve them.  This causes runtime crashes.
